name: Abstract Golfing
description: Abstract Golfing - this is a simple game where you need to throw the ball higher and higher on the mountain, you can not die, there is no reset button, so from this game you get only peace and pleasure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 200 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
